author: Rob Goldberg
title: Canadiens' Jeff Petry Opens $2.5K Daily Tabs to Feed Workers Amid COVID-19
description: Montreal Canadiens  defenseman Jeff Petry is opening tabs at two different local restaurants to feed  hospital employees  during the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
Paul Sancya/Associated Press
Montreal Canadiens defenseman Jeff Petry is opening tabs at two different local restaurants to feed hospital employees during the coronavirus pandemic.
